title: Drawkcab Brown Meets Yuck Mouth Pete
description: Drawkcab Brown ventures west. Meets an outlaw on his quest. Will he save the day again? Or this time will the villain win? One will triumph; one will retreat; when Drawkcab Brown Meets Yuck Mouth Pete! This rhyming children's book delivers uproarious levels of story time fun for parents and children alike, while teaching a lesson on the perils of meanness.
author: Rosalind  Kai Morris
